definition: axis of symmetry/central axis (in Chinese architecture)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: And, of course, that only works if the solid has some axis of symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 當然，前提是物體的對稱軸存在。

sentences.english: Based on the coordinate transformation, the formula of symmetry axes transformation is driven.
sentences.chinese: 利用座標變換，導出對稱軸的變換公式。

sentences.english: The second image is obtained by rotating the cross-grating interferometer an angle about its axis of symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 將光柵干涉儀繞其對稱軸轉過一角度，得到第二個像。

sentences.english: And fivefold, threefold and twofold axes of rotational symmetry.
sentences.chinese: 五重，三重和兩重螺旋對稱軸。
